723575f-b.title: Manhattan: Trinity Place - Thames Street
723575f-b.text:
(r)
Trinity Place,West Side and North from Thames Street,showing
the St.Peter's Parochial School for Girls.(R.C.) It is located
at the South West corner of Cedar Street. A portion of the
Sixth Avenue ''L',since demolished,may be seen in picture.
June 4th,I933
(2)
Same from South West corner of Cedar Street.
May 4th,I94I
(3)
Same from a different angle.
May 4th,I940
Photographs by,
P.L.Sperr,
No Reproductions.

723573f-c.text:

88-90 Trinity Place at the South West corner of Thames Street,

Street.

723574f-a.title: Manhattan: Trinity Place - Thames Street
723574f-a.text:
90-88, 86-78 and (part of) 76-70 Trinity Place, at, adjoining and south
of the S.W. corner of Thames Street (right, not shown), sho ing conseoutiwly,
the New York University School of Comcerce (Wall Street divisions), the New
York Curb Exchange and Trinity Court building. Also shown is Trinity Grave
Yard and a portion of the Ninth Ave. Elevated Line on Trinity Place.
Subsequent to 1921.
Ewing Galloway.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

723501f-a.title: Manhattan: Thames Street - Trinity Place
723501f-a.text:
Thames Street, west from, but not including Trinity Place, to and in-
cluding Greenwich Street. showing a silhouette of a portion of the Sixth Ave.
Elevated Line, against a 3 1/2-story house, No. 126 on the latter Street.
In the background is visible part of the 28-story West Street Building on the
N.E. corner of West and Albany Streets.
July 3, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
723501f-a.folder: Thames Street & Trinity Place, Manhattan, NY
